children.subject: Should be I didn't seem anything saying it wouldn't.
Yup the decal will be offered - more info will be released soon!
When will the decal acceptances/rejections come out?
Unrelated note but will the quant decal stat198 be offered this semester?

history.content:
Interested in trading or exploring a career in quantitative finance? Look no further! Traders at Berkeley, UC Berkeley's premier undergraduate quantitative finance club, is dedicated to cultivating professional and academic interest in quant and trading. We would love to have you at the Spring 2022 Berkeley Trading Competition! Our application is now live and due at 11:59 PM on Sunday, January 23rd.

 

The Berkeley Trading Competition is the West Coast’s first intercollegiate electronic trading competition. We invite all undergraduate and graduate students interested in math, computer science, physics, data science, statistics, economics, finance, and other quantitative disciplines to apply. Here’s a peek into what you can expect for the virtual two-day event:

 

  • Simulated market-making games in a real-time trading environment on an electronic trading platform developed by Traders at Berkeley

    • Electronic trading games involving making markets on different securities against other participants over multiple rounds

    • An open-ended research prompt where participants make predictions based on a given dataset of trades

  • Exclusive networking opportunities and workshops with our sponsors including Citadel Securities, Jane Street, Optiver, Flow Traders, DRW, Akuna, HRT, and SIG

  • Up to $10,000 in cash prizes and food vouchers provided to participants

 

The event will take place February 12-13 fully remotely. On Saturday, we will kick off the competition with an opening ceremony in the morning after which participants will play a series of simulated market trading games. Throughout the day, participants will also have exclusive access to info sessions with our sponsors. An awards ceremony will be held on Sunday morning recognizing individual game winners and overall winners. 

 

Please forward the information to your organization members. Traders at Berkeley is dedicated to facilitating stimulating conversations and bridging the gap between professionals and students. We believe that this will be an unparalleled opportunity for students to explore their interest in a career in quant and trading. In the meantime, please let us know if you have any questions. We look forward to seeing your application.

 

Visit https://traders.berkeley.edu/competition to learn more.

➯APPLY HERE

➯Learn more about Traders at Berkeley
